entry.title: GWMDhananjaya/React-color-picker: A React color picker using React hooks (useState, useRef) that lets users select a color and view its HEX, RGB, HSL, and HSV values. Styled with Tailwind CSS, it is lightweight, efficient, and easy to integrate into any React project.
entry.content: A React color picker using React hooks (useState, useRef) that lets users select a color and view its HEX, RGB, HSL, and HSV values. Styled with Tailwind CSS, it is lightweight, efficient, and easy to integrate into any React project.

entry.title: asilvafx/vite-react-boilerplate: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
entry.content: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.

entry.content: Mejiro is a lightweight web viewer with a strong focus on bookmark management.

entry.title: Zaki-1052/GPTPortal: A feature-rich portal to chat with GPT-4, Claude, Gemini, Mistral, & OpenAI Assistant APIs via a lightweight Node.js web app; supports customizable multimodality for voice, images, & files.
